item.title: China has purged its highest-ranked military general. Why?
item.description: Zhang Youxia had been seen as a close ally of China’s leader, Xi Jinping.

item.title: Zhang Youxia: Purge of China's top general leaves military in crisis - BBC
item.description: Zhang Youxia: Purge of China’s top general leaves military in crisis BBCExclusive | China’s Top General Accused of Giving Nuclear Secrets to U.S. - WSJ The Wall Street JournalUS Envoy Says Xi Seeks ‘Total Control’ of Military With Purges Bloomberg.comPurge of top Chinese general throws military into turmoil, raises questions about Taiwan NBC NewsAnalysis: Xi has absolute control over China’s military. Now he wants more CNN

item.title: After Trump strikes Islamist terrorists, US general travels to Nigeria with militants 'on the run'
item.description: Lt. Gen. John Brennan details U.S. military support helping Nigerian forces combat Islamic State and Boko Haram terrorists following strikes that disrupted terror networks.

item.title: China's top general ousted, placed under investigation in latest military purge
item.description: Chinese President Xi Jinping removed China's top general Zhang Youxia amid an investigation for violating party discipline in latest military purge.
